thread.title: Jose Mourinho: This is why I took so long to unleash Henrikh Mkhitaryan at Man United
thread.title_full: Jose Mourinho: This is why I took so long to unleash Henrikh Mkhitaryan at Man United

title: Jose Mourinho: This is why I took so long to unleash Henrikh Mkhitaryan at Man United
text:
Jose Mourinho: This is why I took so long to unleash Henrikh Mkhitaryan at Man United JOSE MOURINHO has explained he didn’t use Manchester United’s Henrikh Mkhitaryan at the start of the season, simply because he was protecting him. PUBLISHED: 23:41,  53, Sun, Feb 5, 2017 
Henrikh Mkhitaryan made a slow start to his Manchester United career, which was partly down to injuries and trying to get to grips with the Premier League. 
However, over the past six weeks, the Armenian has become increasingly influential for the Red Devils. 
The £26million summer signing was on the scoresheet in the 3-0 win over Leicester earlier today. 
Although it seemed Mourinho initially had reservations about Mkhitaryan, he has set the record straight on the matter.   has been instrumental   in recent weeks GETTY Jose Mourinho has explained that he tried to 'protect' Henrikh Mkhitaryan   Manchester
